document_data.caption: A map showing Wrightstone Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Wrightstone Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Wrightstone Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Wrightstone Street was located in the north section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran east to west, originating on [[Shield Street]] and terminating at the junction of the [[Street of Glances]] and [[Staghunter's Way]]. Wrightstone Street was also intersected by [[Sul Street]], [[Mendever Street]], and [[Ivory Street]].
